website_summaries.verdict: Focuses on internal repair of cartilage and tissue.
pros: While priced high, reviews across the board promote this supplement's ability to reduce average joint pain as well as helping heal from illness
cons: Reviews suggest some bottles may lack seals

I am taking them postpartum for tissue & muscle repair, as well as hoping to avoid the dreaded postpartum hair loss. Will try to remember to update again in a few more weeks/months.

customer_reviews.title: My pain is gone and mobility is perfect now. What more can I ask for

customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Pryor

customer_reviews.title: No more Endometriosis pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually it really works!! So far the best brand of Maca we have tried. And even though it says "for mens", my wife has been taking them - it has been helping her tremendously with for Endometriosis. She has been pain free since she started taking this product.
customer_reviews.author: James Day

customer_reviews.title: Not for me ! Be careful all
customer_reviews.text: Ive been take the recommended amout for about 2 1/2 weeks now. I had a rash on my hand (thumb area) and this seems to have cleared it up ! So that was a good thing. I was having some knee pain and i do feel my knees better since taking the product. The only thing and to me the biggist is my labido has decressed and morning errections are not the same ! Therefore will discontinue to use it and return it. Note upon futher research there were complaints that were similar and also found that for-ti ingredient (Chinese) can be the cause there were also reports of liver damage ! Be very careful with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Aguinaga

customer_reviews.title: From skeptical to a beleiver
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my late 60’s (male) and tend to be in-your-face when it comes to describing anything. Over the past year I had an itching problem with my skin in a very sensitive place.. you know, a place where it is embarrassing to scratch in public. Several days after I began taking this, my problem began to disappear and in general my skin tone appears to have improved everywhere else. I’m a believer.

customer_reviews.title: I am stating taking
customer_reviews.text: This product I don t know if it is going to work but what I can recommend you is if you are going to take it do not do it with your stomach empty...do it just before your main meal it could be befor the lunch of dinner because if you do it after the side effects are strong with bloating stomach or farting all over the air and other stuffs. avoid that taking just before your main meal.

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed!

The other day I saw my uncle and we were talking, among other things, about supplements. I immediately recommended this collagen to him and because I ordered a few bottles I gave him one. He immediately and without any hesitation, opened the container and took 3. I truly believe that this is the reason why my skin is looking so healthy. Thank you for having this great product.

customer_reviews.title: My wife ordered this for me.. So i gave it a try..
customer_reviews.text: Took it on the day i received it.. On the bottle it says 6 tablets a day... I decided to take only 4 on that day but after the second one, i felt numbness in my body so i stopped and waited for the next day then i tried it again but now i only took 1 tablet but still felt numbness after taking it.. I guess results vary from person to person.. I suggest to just take 1 tablet first and see how you feel abt it then just gradually increase.. As for me i decided to stop and so did my wife with the variant for women.. It felt like we're gonna have a heart attack.. Scary..
customer_reviews.author: badz

customer_reviews.title: I have also been involved with 2 clinical trials where the used special skin like substances to heal the wound
customer_reviews.text: As a diabetic type 2 I have spent the last 2 years dealing with ulcers/callouses on the bottom of my feet. It takes forever to heal. I have also been involved with 2 clinical trials where the used special skin like substances to heal the wound. They were somewhat effective. This last time (six week period) I was treated at a Wound Care facility at a local hospital. I also started using this Collagen (1000 mg/day) product. This has been the fastest time for the wound to heal. I credit some of this to the collagen which by all reports aids in the development of new skin tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Howard

customer_reviews.title: A supplement well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This supplement, along with biotin, has made a huge difference in my skin, hair, and nails. I bought the men's formula because it was lower priced.
customer_reviews.author: Nashvegas girl

customer_reviews.title: Men's Formula worked better for me.
customer_reviews.text: This really does help cartilage, joints and skin heal faster. Improves skin surface and layers below. Reduces wrinkles due to aging. Helps recovery after running & biking. Small scrapes from yard work, home repairs, etc heal faster. I had a cut that required stitches; taking this during healing process, along with light lotion after stitch removal has left scar almost invisible. I have used the regular Youtheory Collagen and definitely notice a difference. Better than other brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: David Renken

customer_reviews.title: NON GMO - Collagen used to come from Soup Bones - Most of Americans are deficient
customer_reviews.text: Recommended dose is 6 per day. The first 6 months I stuck to that then cut back to 2 at bed and 1 at breakfast. I started having people asking me, What are you using on your skin, you have a glow. It causes the Nails to Grow like crazy too. Also hair! I have Large Tattoos and as my skin would get dry it would make the colors seems dull. Now I hear how do you keep your body ant so vibrant! The proof is in the bottle. If your a MAN, make sure you pick the MALE version. There are lots of boosters in there. They make a great version for the Ladies in your life too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION - Contains estrogenic compound
customer_reviews.text: In the past I used this same brand collagen, so I decided to try this "men's version". However, I was unaware that it contains "Fo-ti root extract", which is something I've never heard of, but looking it up it's a VERY Estrogenic compound, even more so than soy or red clover. Why would a company add estrogen to a "men's" supplement?! Threw out the whole bottle when I realized. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Leopold Stotch

customer_reviews.title: A 5 Star product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! In order to get the full effects of this product; 30 minutes of cardio a day, 32 to 64oz of water a day, and use the pills with your evening meal. What I have noticed is that my hair has become thicker, nails grow faster, and my skin has become more plump (in a good way). It also helps with skin healing. It was shipped very quickly and expiration date is clearly visible. You cannot go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ares

customer_reviews.title: Decalcifies the pineal gland
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I have tried shilajit. I like it a lot. I am 73 and I find it to be a necessary supplement for the mind and body. This product by Youtheory is very potent, consistent, and well worth the price. Look up the information about where shilajit comes from, how it has been used historically, and why it can be a great supplement to our demanding modern life. It was new to me. I now take it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Bowsky

customer_reviews.title: COLLAGEN MADE IS ABLE TO WALK AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on Hospice at home. He is an Army Vet. While he was in hospital several years ago they started him in Lovistain for cholesterol creating extreme pain in legs until he could no longer walk. I started him on the Collagen after I was able to walk from taking it. His pain is gone and so is mine.

For the same period of time I have also been exercising regularly on a total body regime on weight machines at our local community center under the direction of my 86 year old personal trainer. The exercise clearly helps my arthritis and I believe that the Joint Complex strengthens and cushions all my joints from the physical workouts 2-3 times a week.

customer_reviews.title: Youthful again
customer_reviews.text: I don't remember what reason I bought this product. Though there's nothing wrong with it. It does help with libido, though that wasn't what got me to buy. It's not viagra but you will notice a difference with this product if you use the full suggested serving.
customer_reviews.author: J

product_meta.title: Youtheory Men's Collagen Advanced with Biotin, 290 Count (1 Bottle)
product_meta.description: Size:290 Count (Pack of 1)| Style:Collagen AdvancedMen's collagen advanced is the protein that binds cells together. It is our body's key structural protein for creating strong and healthy muscle, tendons and ligaments. The added ingredients in men's collagen rejuvenates your hair. Men's collagen is critical to the formation and ongoing health of your body. Stay strong and youthful as you age with youtheory men's collagen advanced. Promotes healthy aging, supports bone health, great for ligaments & tendons, rejuvenates hair. Other Ingredients: Calcium Carbonate, Dicalcium Phosphate Magnesium Stearate (vegetable grade). Dietary supplement is Gluten, Dairy and Soy Free.
feature_bullets: COLLAGEN PEPTIDES WITH BIOTIN: Collagen diminishes with age. Youtheory MEN’S Collagen Advanced with Biotin helps replenish this vital protein to fight the effects of aging by revitalizing skin, hair, nails, tendons and ligaments.

HYDROLYZED COLLAGEN PROTEIN: Collagen is the main component of healthy joint cartilage, which acts as a cushion between bones. Our hydrolyzed formula is highly bioavailable which means it is easily and rapidly absorbed in the body.
THE BEST NATURE AND SCIENCE CAN OFFER: Feel good inside and out. We believe that health and beauty start within by using the best wellness supplements on the market.

MEN’S HEALTH SUPPLEMENTS: Find the best in you with an innovative line of health and wellness supplements that make you look and feel your best at any stage of life. Support healthy sleep, weight, energy, libido and mood with Youtheory.
THE RIGHT CHOICE: Dairy free, Soy free, and contains No Gluten Ingredients. This product is third-party tested and manufactured in the USA.
